column4: hey in fiesty is compiz the default wm? (whether or not all the fancy features are turned on)
cause i turned off desktop effects, and i still see a compiz process and no metacity process
regardless, so you're saying metacity SHOULD kick in?
strange stuff, desktop effects turnd off?
yep, i might try restarting, or at least starting a new session
u could disable composite on option in xorg etc..
you think it detects that and goes "lawl turn on compiz"
but till u discover culprit u can disable gl in xorg and compiz will not work, if it irritates u...
well i've setup beryl on my own before, i know more of xorg.conf than i ever wanted to
but like i said i'm gonna try a new session first
aha u have beryl installed? and running?
i found out the problem too, the "enable desktop effects" button actually functions like a checkbox, which wasn't very clear in my current theme, i'm running metacity now
yeah, found it strange, good for u!!
